name: Braised Pork Rice
description: A delicious bowl of rice topped with braised pork belly, marinated egg, and vegetables.

name: Beef Noodle Soup
description: A savory soup made with tender beef, hand-pulled noodles, and aromatic spices.

name: Xiao Long Bao
description: Steamed soup dumplings with thin wrapper, filled with juicy pork and rich broth.

name: Gua Bao
description: A Taiwanese-style pork bun filled with braised pork belly, pickled vegetables, and cilantro.

name: Hot Pot
description: Various soup bases served with a wide selection of meats, seafood, vegetables, and noodles.

name: Turnip Cake
description: Pan-fried radish cake, optionally served with egg.

name: Braised Food
description: Various braised ingredients with customizable spice level and toppings.

name: Dumplings
description: Freshly boiled dumplings filled with tender pork and chives, served with a side of soy-vinegar dipping sauce. Customize with chili oil for extra spice.

name: Chicken Cutlet
description: Crispy, juicy fried chicken cutlet with optional seasonings and spice levels.

name: Fried Stinky Tofu
description: Fermented and fried tofu served with Thai-style sauce and pickled vegetables.

name: Scallion Pancake
description: Layered flatbread with scallions, optionally served with egg.

name: Sweet Potato Balls
description: Crispy sweet potato balls dusted with powdered sugar.

name: Taiwanese Fried Chicken
description: Crispy fried chicken pieces with special seasoning powder.

name: Grilled Taiwanese Sausage
description: Grilled Taiwanese pork sausage, optionally served with sticky rice sausage, garlic slices and scallions.

name: Milk-based Drinks
description: Different types of milk tea, including bubble tea, black milk tea, taro milk tea, honey milk tea and more.

name: Tea-based Drinks
description: Traditional Taiwanese teas, such as Oolong tea, Finest Mountain Tea, and Green tea, Puer tea, Black tea

name: Fruit-based Tea Drinks
description: Refreshing fruit-infused teas like Honey Lemon Tea, Passion Fruit Green Tea, and Kumquat Lemon Juice.

name: Wellness Drinks
description: Health-focused beverages like Longan and Red Date Tea, Goji Berry Tea, and Chrysanthemum Tea.

name: Shakes / Slushies
description: Icy, fruit-based drinks like Mango Slush, Strawberry Slush, and Kiwi Slush.

name: Dessert Drinks
description: Sweet drinks that double as desserts, including Pudding Milk Tea, Red Bean Milk, and Aiyu Jelly.

name: Taro Balls
description: Chewy balls made from taro, served in hot or cold soup.

name: Pineapple Cake
description: Traditional pastry with buttery crust filled with pineapple jam.

name: Mango Shaved Ice
description: Shaved ice topped with fresh mangoes and condensed milk.

name: Grass Jelly Dessert
description: Hot or cold grass jelly dessert with various toppings.

name: Tofu Pudding
description: Soft tofu pudding served with various toppings and sweet syrup.

name: Aiyu Jelly
description: Cooling summer drink made with aiyu fig seeds jelly.
